verses.name: Esther 1:11
verses.text: To bring Vashti the queen before the king with the crown royal, to shew the people and the princes her beauty: for she was fair to look on.

verses.name: Esther 1:12
verses.text: But the queen Vashti refused to come at the king’s commandment by his chamberlains: therefore was the king very wroth, and his anger burned in him.

verses.name: Esther 1:13
verses.text: Then the king said to the wise men, which knew the times, (for so was the king’s manner toward all that knew law and judgment:
